content: crochet pattern for snoopy by @astitchinthedark 05/28/2020 vikkidavis89@gmail com materials needed snoopy is from charlie brown this is a free ● worsted weight yarn in white red and black i pattern designed by me show me your beautiful used impeccable by loops & threads creations and let me know what you think xx ● black embroidery thread ● 4 25mm crochet hook ● darning needle ● polyester fiberfill abbreviations us terms 1 magic_ring- magic_ring 2 single_crochet- single_crochet 3 increase- increase 2 single_crochet in 1 stitch 4 inv decrease- invisible decrease single_crochet 2 together in the front loops only so the back loops hide the small hole that forms easier 5 picot-ch3 and slipstitch into the 3rd chain from the hook to create a little point/triangle 6 slip_stitch-slip_stitch 7 x-times/multiply by 8 >-total stitches in row 9 f o - fasten_off pattern instructions body work from the bottom up in white 1 magic_ring 6 2 incx6> 12 3 sc1 increase x6>18 4 single_crochet 1 increase single_crochet 2 increase x5 single_crochet 1>24 5 single_crochet 3 increase x6>30 6 single_crochet 2 increase single_crochet 4 increase x5 single_crochet 2>36 7 single_crochet 5 increase x 6>42 8 single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet 6 increase x5 single_crochet 3>48 9-13 single_crochet 48 14 single_crochet 6 inv decrease x6>42 15 single_crochet 42 16 single_crochet 5 inv decrease x6>36 17-19 single_crochet 36 20 single_crochet 4 inv decrease x6>30 21-23 single_crochet 30 24 single_crochet 3 inv decrease x6>24 25-26 single_crochet 24 27 single_crochet 2 inv decrease x6>18 28 single_crochet 18 f o head in white 1 magic_ring 6 2 increase x 6>12 3 sc1 increase x 6>18 4 sc1 increase sc2 increase x5 sc1>24 5 single_crochet 3 increase x6>30 6 single_crochet 2 increase single_crochet 4 increase x5 single_crochet 2>36 7 single_crochet 5 increase > 42 8 single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet 6 increase x5 sc3> 48 9 single_crochet 7 increase x6> 54 10-16 single_crochet 54 17 single_crochet 7 inv decrease x5 single_crochet in last 10 sts >49 ** at this point you ll want to mark the beginning and end of those 10 sts with safety pins/ stitch ears markers etc this will be the bottom of snoopy s face in black this is a good time to embroider the mouth the make 4 eyes or try a pair of safety eyes if you prefer 1 magic_ring 6 18 single_crochet 3 inv decrease single_crochet 6 inv decrease x4 single_crochet in last 2 single_crochet 3 in the first st single_crochet 2 in the second st single_crochet in 12 sts > 44 the third single_crochet 3 in the fourth st single_crochet 2 in the fifth st 19 single_crochet 5 inv decrease x5 single_crochet in last 10sts >39 and single_crochet in the last st 20 single_crochet 2 inv decrease single_crochet 4 inv decrease x4 single_crochet 3 single_crochet increase increase increase single_crochet 3 increase increase increase sc2 remaining 11 sts >34 4 single_crochet 2 increase single_crochet x3 single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet x3 single_crochet 21-29 single_crochet 34 5 single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet x3 single_crochet 6 increase single_crochet
